recommendations.name: Multi-Step Transformation
recommendations.description: Chain multiple transformations (e.g., rotate THEN color map)
recommendations.implementation: Try compositions of successful individual transforms

recommendations.name: Iterative Refinement
recommendations.implementation: Score intermediate results, adjust based on partial match

recommendations.name: Negative Space Analysis
recommendations.description: Understand background vs foreground, holes vs solid
recommendations.implementation: Invert thinking - what is NOT there vs what IS there

recommendations.name: Size Relationship Learner
recommendations.implementation: Detect scale factors, ratios, patterns in size changes

recommendations.name: Composition/Tiling Detector
recommendations.description: Detect when output is composed by repeating/tiling input
recommendations.implementation: Check if output is np.tile(input, (h, w)) or concatenation

recommendations.name: Object Selection/Cropping
recommendations.description: Extract specific objects or crop to relevant region
recommendations.implementation: Connected component analysis + bounding box extraction
